abstract: An online petition opposing Bank of America's new debit-card fee has drawn over 200,000 supporters.
snippet: An online petition opposing Bank of America's new debit-card fee has drawn over 200,000 supporters.
lead_paragraph: An online petition started by a young Washington, D.C., woman opposing Bank of America's new $5 a month debit-card fee has attracted more than 200,000 supporters - and, according to the organizer, a personal call from a bank executive.

headline.main: Petition on Debit Card Fee Attracts 200,000 Supporters
